analysis.description:

StandardLockableToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#617-622) is declared view but contains assembly code
empty in StandardBurnableLockableToken.burn (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#747-748) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in StandardBurnableLockableToken.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#734) is a local variable never initialiazed

StandardLockableToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#678-702) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,empty) (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#699)

StandardLockableToken._transfer (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#650-671) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (/unique_chucks/44/0x726ba175035aa622c3c12b74efc577bb1081593a.sol#664-665)
